name: ReutersAudioNewsBriefing(US)
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Reuters News Briefing is your 5 minute news briefing from Reuters. Updated around the clock by editorial teams on four continents, Reuters taps into a network of 2,500 journalists reporting from 200 locations worldwide. Straight from the source and made to fit your day.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
